title: Poster, 1993-53-88, ca. 1980
inscribed: Other text: "Freeze Your Bills, Not Your Bones. The energy conservation program Con Ed won't tell you about...After ConEd reads your meter: 1. Turn off Gas A...5. Budget wisely, do without ConEd" Imprinted with stamp: "CAUTION always check for gas leaks"
creditline: Gift of Steven Heller and Karrie Jacobs
